attributes.action: USA drinks in Starbucks need to be bought to the UK!!
attributes.additional_details: Starbucks has failed to make a variety of good drinks in the UK. However, in the USA they are not going through this punishment l. I believe we have the equal right to have a good range of drinks in the UK as we are equally important
attributes.background: Starbucks has failed to make a variety of good drinks in the UK. However, in the USA they are not going through this punishment l. I believe we have the equal right to have a good range of drinks in the UK as we are equally important.

rejection.details: The UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for the issue you have raised. It would be a decision for Starbucks.
